titleStmt.title: Jasper N. Bertram Personal Documents and Correspondance
titleStmt.author: Various Authors
titleStmt.editor: Jules Lockett, Sofia Posada, Nic Staley

publicationStmt.p: While these documents represent a small fraction of the materials present within archive of Jasper N. Bertram, we hope to attach this TEI encoding to the archival record so that it may aid in distribution and availability of these materials digitally.

sourceDesc.p:
The J.N. Bertram letters are a collection of letters that include personal correspondence, business correspondence, and newspaper clippings. The material transcribed in this edition is a sample from those three categories, including handwritten letters, typewritten correspondences, and newspaper clippings.
Jasper N. Bertram Papers Various Personal archives, unpublished Early 1900's: 1902-1909 4215-001 3 of 7 3-2 "General Correspondance"

normalization.p: In an effort to preserve authorial intent of manuscript documents, primarily comprised of letters of correspondence, we have chosen to leave all spelling and grammar errors. This choice was done in order for our edition to reflect the people composing the documents and the time period in which they were written.

punctuation.p: Some letters contain no punctuation at all. No corrections were made to preserve authorial voice.

correction.p: Errors were left unedited; any misspellings or odd capitalizations that appear in the text were directly from the source. Places where text is unidentifiable will be marked <gap/>
